typography.instructions: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css. Use Manrope for all Headings (h1-h3) and Inter for body text.

usage_rules: Use pure white (#FFFFFF) for cards and main surfaces.
Use subtle gray (#F8FAFC) for the sidebar and app background.
Primary blue (#2563EB) is for high-priority actions only (Save, Submit, Create).
Text should never be pure black (#000000). Use Slate-900 (#0F172A) for highest contrast.

layout.grid_system: Mode B: The Control Room Grid (Dense, Data-Correlated)

header.bg: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-slate-200 sticky top-0 z-50

buttons.default: h-9 px-4 py-2 rounded-md text-sm font-medium transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 shadow-sm hover:bg-slate-50

cards.base: rounded-lg border border-slate-200 bg-white text-slate-950 shadow-sm

inputs.base: flex h-9 w-full rounded-md border border-slate-200 bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-slate-500 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-blue-600 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

badges.base: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2

universal_guidelines: Use 'Manrope' for all headings and 'Inter' for body text.
Maintain a strict light mode theme. Do not use dark mode colors unless explicitly for high-contrast accents.
All interactive elements must have a hover state (usually bg-slate-100 or text-blue-600).
Ensure all inputs and buttons have 'data-testid' attributes.
Do not use native HTML select or date inputs; use Shadcn Select and Calendar.
Sidebar must be collapsible and persist state.
Role-based access control must be enforced at the route level.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building the foundational structure. Focus on the Layout (Sidebar + Header), Authentication (Mock Google OAuth), and Role-Based Routing. Do not build the inner page content yet, just placeholders. Use the provided assets for logos and avatars. Follow the color palette strictly.
